item.title: Lamp post not working, 10th January
item.description:
Lamp post outside 90 Alleyn Road not working - been like this for a few weeks. Very dark as the lighting on this road is quite spaced out. Feels unsafe as a pedestrian.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Alleyn Road, Dulwich, Greater London

item.title: Dog faeces, 10th January
item.description:
Since the tree was removed outside 14 Cardiff Street in August 2025 we have been left with a pile of compacted sawdust, this has now become a dog toilet. It is unpleasant and obviously smells at times. This needs to be cleaned and the sawdust needs to be levelled and replaced with asphalt or paving stones

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cardiff Street, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped waste, 10th January
item.description:
The waste has been there for a few weeks, the bags have now split and rubbish is strewn over the area. It is clearly attracting wildlife and needs to be cleared away. This spot is regularly used for fly tipping and would benefit from monitoring or signage.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Freda Corbett Close, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Big dog poo, 10th January
item.description:
